info.title: BaSyx Asset Administration Shell Repository HTTP REST-API
info.description: The full description of the generic BaSyx Asset Administration Shell Repository HTTP REST-API

get.summary: Retrieves all Asset Administration Shells from the Asset Administration Shell repository

200.description: Returns a list of found Asset Administration Shells

get.summary: Retrieves a specific Asset Administration Shell from the Asset Administration Shell repository

parameters.name: aasId
parameters.description: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id

schema.description: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id

200.description: Returns the requested Asset Administration Shell

parameters.description: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
